dlcDetailsView.downloadTitle: Security Update for SQL Server 2017 RTM CU (KB5046858)
dlcDetailsView.downloadDescription: This update refreshes Microsoft SQL Server 2017 RTM CU.
dlcDetailsView.detailsSection:
Security issues have been identified in the SQL Server that could allow an attacker to compromise your system.
You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.

More information about the vulnerability can be found here: KB5046858

For a complete listing of the issues resolved in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article.
dlcDetailsView.systemRequirementsSection: This update is applicable to SQL Server 2017 RTM instances installed on supported Windows operating systems.
dlcDetailsView.installInstructionSection:
This update refreshes Microsoft SQL Server 2017 RTM Windows instances that have had a Cumulative Update applied.
After you install this update, you may have to restart your computer.
